Text:
THANK YOU A LOT for this nikita!!!!
would love to see the SERVER edition....

I love it, when I take a product tour on Google and come here to grab it :P

Thx, dude, +1

NOTE: this is just the recovery CD, which means you burn the iso and then you can boot from it within a minimal windows environment - to use your whole computer, you will then need to manually install drivers.  It does not install the program on your disk.

It works fine and is a useful tool - thanks

This software helped me in converting a dynamic disk to a basic disk, something other disk management programs (including those of Minitool and EaseUS) had failed to perform. Besides that, this suite of hard disk management software seems like a total solution for all disk related issues. So, thanks a lot for making it free and sharing it.

And thanks "armchair.53" for that useful headsup. It really helped me understand what I could expect in this download.
